meanings.definition: A person who gives a guarantee.
meanings.sent1: My dad was the guarantor for my car loan.
meanings.sent2: The guarantor of the contract ensured payment.
meanings.sent3: The guarantor of the picnic promised sunny weather.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was the guarantor of a warm welcome.
meanings.sent5: The guarantor of success is hard work and dedication.

meanings.sent1: The written agreement acted as the guarantor of the deal.
meanings.sent2: The warranty served as a guarantor of product quality.
meanings.sent3: The lucky charm became the guarantor of good fortune.
meanings.sent4: The lighthouse was the guarantor of safe navigation.
meanings.sent5: The handshake was the guarantor of trust between them.
